What are the benefits of Verus Coin in terms of processing power and transaction security?

Verus Coin offers the advantage of being able to use both CPUs and GPUs for processing power. Additionally, it provides advanced zero-knowledge privacy using Sapling-generation zk-SNARKs, which enables fast, secure, and private transactions and messages.
